name: A haunted room
desc: You see a shadowy specter disappear in the distance. You are creeped out.

name: A dark shabby room
desc: You hear strange voices. You think you have awoken some of the dead.

name: A bone room
desc: You see a wall of skeletons as you walk into the room. Something is waiting for you.

name: A room full of fear
desc: A strange ghoul-like creature has appeared. You can either 'go' or 'attack' it.
